QuestData.Title: On Eagle's Wings
QuestData.Description: Since ancient times, my order has stood vigil on these Broken Isles, watching for the Legion's return. Only a handful of us remain... but that changes today.$b$bThe artifact you hold is more than a weapon. It is a symbol that will unite hunters of all kingdoms and creeds.$b$bI'm sure you have questions. Meet me at the Trueshot Lodge in Highmountain and see with your own eyes what awaits us. Snowfeather and I will make our own way there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Emmarel Shadewarden at Trueshot Lodge in Highmountain.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to the flight master in Krasus' Landing
Meet Emmarel Shadewarden at the Trueshot Lodge
